document_data.name: Maendellyn
document_data.History:
House Maendellyn was believed by [[Sylmae Auglamyr]] to be power-hungry and likely to take advantage of any situation as of {{yearlink|241}}.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|259-264|13}} but Lord [[Ondabrar Maendellyn]] was a participant in the raising of the ''[[mythal]]'' in the {{yearlinkName|261}}.{{cite book/Cormanthyr: Empire of the Elves|143}}

When the [[Srinshee]] drew the [[Rulers' Blade]], some of the rebels attempting to slay her were from House Maendellyn.{{cite book/The Fall of Myth Drannor|6}}
